title: The Story Pirates + Brains On!: Dr. Weirdo and the Boring Unicorn
description:
The Story Pirates take a break from summer bonus episodes to team up with Brains On! for a special collaborative episode. Featuring a brand new story called Dr. Weirdo and the Boring Unicorn, written by a Virginia 3rd grader named Lucyna, as well as a special Brains On! segment about why jokes are funny.
Be sure to listen our companion episode over at Brains On! for more Story Pirates + Brains On awesomeness!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
